Label.en: They get up to a lot… including going for night swims!
Label.fr: Ils y sont très actifs...y compris pour prendre des bains de nuit !
Label.es: They get up to a lot… including going for night swims!
Label.zh: They get up to a lot… including going for night swims!

Label.en: They very likely know the tunnel system better than the authorities
Label.fr: ...et connaissent probablement les tunnels mieux que les autorités
Label.es: They very likely know the tunnel system better than the authorities
Label.zh: They very likely know the tunnel system better than the authorities

Label.en: Do you approve of their activities?
Label.es: Do you approve of their activities?
Label.zh: Do you approve of their activities?

Label.en: Anyway, I hoped you liked my story!
Label.fr: En tous cas, j'espère que tu as aimé l'histoire !
Label.es: Anyway, I hoped you liked my story!
Label.zh: Anyway, I hoped you liked my story!

Label.en: Try visiting the catacombs, if you’re brave enough
Label.fr: Fais-y un tour si tu es d'humeur téméraire
Label.es: Try visiting the catacombs, if you’re brave enough
Label.zh: Try visiting the catacombs, if you’re brave enough
